valid_presenter.name: valid_presenter
valid_presenter.value: "event_presenters"."researcher_id" IS NOT NULL OR "event_presenters"."external_name" IS NOT NULL

main_types_need_venue.name: main_types_need_venue
main_types_need_venue.value: "publications"."type" NOT IN ('journal_article', 'conference_paper') OR "publications"."venue" IS NOT NULL

valid_media_parent.name: valid_media_parent
valid_media_parent.value: "award_media"."scholarship_id" IS NOT NULL OR "award_media"."recipient_id" IS NOT NULL
